Simplicity is the core of LetSketch. We are working on regular updates to bring new features and improvements.
This update includes:
• Faster experience
• UI changes and improvements
• UX changes and improvements
• Various bug fixes

We are excited to release LetSketch 12.
This version comes with a lot of changes and improvements:

• iOS 12 support
• New App icon
• Improved user interface with a beautiful Dark Mode
• Improved user experience
• Redo button
• Bru

We are excited to release LetSketch 12.
This version comes with a lot of changes and improvements:

• iOS 12 support
• New App icon
• Improved user interface with a beautiful Dark Mode
• Improved user experience
• Redo button
• Bru

• Fixed a bug that didn't allow to save the sketch.
• Fixed a bug that didn't allow to insert photo reference.

New! (in-app purchase)
LetSketch Stats: Statistics of your artwork!

Recent update:

• Fixed a bug that didn't allow to save the sketch.
• Fixed a bug that didn't allow to insert photo reference.
